channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
I am kinda stuck :( I feal embarresed posting this but im reallly stuck
in the guide board it says
"Ok now go into your server source (if you dont have a rar uncompressor you can download 7zip at this link: 7zip, or you can download rar uncompresser at this link: WinRar. Ok now you can right click the compressed source and click "extract here"), and now when in your server srouce, right click compile.bat and click "edit". Then erase everything in it and put this in it's place:
Code: @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause Ok now save it and right click runserver.bat and erase all of that and add this: "
And i dont know where the button "exract here" is or what the "comressed source" is in win rar
Please help (PS.If it helps Pimp scape is the one that i am starting out with)
oh and also if you can , help me through it beyond that but for now i just need help with that :| :| :| :| :| :|

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Grim_Reaper_Ownage Grim Reaper Ownage
item.description:
@Grim_Reaper_Ownage wrote:

If you extract it and then edit the compiler just save it and use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @ronmoore321 ronmoore321
item.description:
@ronmoore321 wrote:

I am kinda stuck I feal embarresed posting this but im reallly stuck

in the guide board it says

"Ok now go into your server source (if you dont have a rar uncompressor you can download 7zip at this link: 7zip, or you can download rar uncompresser at this link: WinRar. Ok now you can right click the compressed source and click “extract here”),
and now when in your server srouce, right click compile.bat and click “edit”. Then erase everything in it and put this in it’s place:

Code:
@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
Ok now save it and right click runserver.bat and erase all of that and add this:
"

And i dont know where the button “exract here” is or what the “comressed source” is in win rar

Please help (PS.If it helps Pimp scape is the one that i am starting out with)

oh and also if you can , help me through it beyond that but for now i just need help with that

Read full topic
